name: Shuai Tong (童率)
description:
Biography: I am currently a fifth-year Ph.D. student from Tsinghua University. My supervisor is professor [Jiliang Wang](http://tns.thss.tsinghua.edu.cn/~jiliang). I received my B.S. degree from Nankai University in 2019. My research interests include Internet of Things, LoRa, and mobile computing. I enjoy building proof-of-concepts for innovative applications, encompassing both hardware and software aspects.
I am currently on the job market!
E-Mail: tongshuai.ts AT gmail.com
